dakagannata labune itha dukbara mohothak.yam aaharayak kadayen ragena kamata athamite mudal nomathi me yuwala thamange malle kadadasiyaka otha thibu yamdeyak eliyata gaththa.roti kihipayak ha lunu miris tikak ehi thibuna.roti kallak kadagath ee tharunaya ehi lunu miris swalpayak thawara tharuniyata kawwa.thawath chuti roti kallak kadagath ohu eya hondata podikara darupatiyata kawwa.inpasu ohuda roti kallak kate dagaththa.inpasu basaya nawatha gaman arambauwa.daruwa thama thurulata gath tharunaya tharuniyawa thama urayata heththu karagaththa.in tika welawakata pasu mata asunak labuna,nodanima mata hondatama ninda giya.hadisiyema aharuna mata mulin netha giye ma methek kathakala asuna wethata,namuth mata owun aapasu dakinna labune na.

aarthika sanwardhanaya - wikipidiya, nidahas wishwakoshaya (aarthika sanwardhana aakruthi wethin yali-yomu karana ladi) nawa karmikaranaya wu ratawal wenath nagi ena welanda pola wenath sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina aarthikayan aarthika sanwardhanaya yanu rate minisun sura kamaki kalapayaka, rata wasinge subha sadhanaya wenuwen athi aarthika dhanayayi.
